query-04.description: Basic graph pattern, fixed subject, join on subject

query-05.description: Basic graph pattern, fixed subject, join on subject and predicate

query-06.description: Basic graph pattern, fixed subject and graph, join on subject

query-07.description: Join (Basic graph pattern, fixed subject, join on subject), (Triple pattern, fixed predicate) on graph=subject

query-08.description: Join (Basic graph pattern, fixed subject, join on subject, fixed predicate2), (Triple pattern, fixed predicate) on graph=subject

query-09.description: MAX object2 by graph(Basic graph pattern, fixed predicate and object and predicate2, join on subject)
query-09.query: PREFIX bsbm: <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/bizer/bsbm/v01/vocabulary/> SELECT ?vg (MAX(?rating) as ?maxrating) WHERE { GRAPH ?vg { ?s a bsbm:Review ; bsbm:rating3 ?rating . } } GROUP BY ?vg

query-10.description: COUNT object by object2 (Join (Basic graph pattern, fixed predicate and object and predicate2, join on subject), (Triple pattern, fixed predicate) on graph=subject)
query-10.query: PREFIX bsbm: <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/bizer/bsbm/v01/vocabulary/> PREFIX vers: <https://github.com/VCityTeam/ConVer-G/Version#> SELECT ?graph (COUNT(?rating) as ?countrating) WHERE { GRAPH ?vg { ?s a bsbm:Review ; bsbm:rating3 ?rating . } ?vg vers:is-version-of ?graph . } GROUP BY ?graph

query-11.description: AVG object by object2 (Join (Basic graph pattern, fixed predicate and object and predicate2, join on subject), (Triple pattern, fixed predicate) on graph=subject)
query-11.query: PREFIX bsbm: <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/bizer/bsbm/v01/vocabulary/> PREFIX vers: <https://github.com/VCityTeam/ConVer-G/Version#> SELECT ?version (AVG(?rating) as ?avgrating) WHERE { GRAPH ?vg { ?s a bsbm:Review ; bsbm:rating3 ?rating . } ?vg vers:is-in-version ?version . } GROUP BY ?version

query-12.description: Join (Quad pattern, fixed predicate), (Optional Quad pattern, fixed predicate) on subject=subject

query-13.description: Quad pattern, fixed predicate, filter on object

query-16.description: MAX object by graph (Quad pattern fixed predicate)

query-17.description: COUNT subject by object2 (Basic graph pattern, fixed predicate and object and predicate2, join on subject)
